text: Jacques Peten (8 December 1912 - 1995) was a Belgian alpine skier and tennis player. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. Peten represented Belgium in the Davis Cup, appearing in seven ties between 1946 and 1951, as well as competing in the French Championships, Wimbledon and the U.S. Championships. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Belgian male alpine skiers Category:Belgian male tennis players Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Belgium Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Antwerp
title: Jacques Peten
